info.name: XOR ^ float(n)
info.description:
effect of bitwise operators XOR, AND, OR once powered by fractionals from 0 (left) to 4 (right)
Strange how Xor "hashes" into circuit-like patterns.

see also [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/ttscRN[/url] and  [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/wllcRN[/url]

renderpass.name: Image
